name: f1-manager-light
description: A clean, GitHub-ready bundle containing: - **/data**: normalized JSONs (drivers, teams, staff, tracks, calendar 1980, rules/era, attributes dictionaries, etc.). - **/data/seeds**: gameplay seeds (events, inbox, sponsors). - **/scripts**: helpers to validate and (optionally) ingest a single Excel file into JSONs. - **/src**: minimal loader utilities (JS) that read the JSONs.
